description.plain:
New Politics are a pop-rock band from Copenhagen, Demark consisting of the members David Boyd (Lead Singer), Søren Hansen (Secondary Vocalist and Lead Guitar) and Louis Vecchio (Drums and Additional Gang Vocals).
The band was formed in 2009 and have released five albums since their formation, with their newest addition being “[An Invitation to an Alternate Reality]” (https://genius.com/albums/New-politics/An-invitation-to-an-alternate-reality) being released on October 1, 2019.

body.plain:
New Politics are a pop-rock band from Copenhagen, Demark consisting of the members David Boyd (Lead Singer), Søren Hansen (Secondary Vocalist and Lead Guitar) and Louis Vecchio (Drums and Additional Gang Vocals).
The band was formed in 2009 and have released five albums since their formation, with their newest addition being “[An Invitation to an Alternate Reality]” (https://genius.com/albums/New-politics/An-invitation-to-an-alternate-reality) being released on October 1, 2019.

songs.title: Harlem

description.plain: The song “Harlem” is about a girl David Boyd met when he and the rest of the band moved to Brooklyn. It touches on the fact they’re normal guys just like the rest of us.

songs.embed_content: Read “Harlem” by New Politics on Genius

album.full_title: A Bad Girl In Harlem by New Politics
album.name: A Bad Girl In Harlem

body.plain: The song “Harlem” is about a girl David Boyd met when he and the rest of the band moved to Brooklyn. It touches on the fact they’re normal guys just like the rest of us.

songs.lyrics:
19 ContributorsHarlem Lyrics[Verse 1]
I spend my money on the regular miracles
Just like you, like me, like everybody else
Up on the sun, looking sad and beautiful
Just like you, like me, like everybody else

[Chorus]
When it gets loud, I turn it up
Oh, shake it like a bad girl up in Harlem
When it's too hot, I light it up
Oh, light it up, yeah, smoke 'em if you got 'em
[Verse 2]
Here come the jets, hide my money in your tube socks
Run like me, like hell, like everybody else
Hair metal on a Japanese boom box
Kicks like you, like me, like everybody else

[Chorus]
When it gets loud, I turn it up
Oh, shake it like a bad girl up in Harlem
When it's too hot, I light it up
Oh, light it up yeah, smoke 'em if you got 'em
When it's too soft, I shake it up
Sh-sh-sh-shake like a bad girl up in Harlem
You're so sweet, but I like it rough
Oh, light it up, yeah, smoke 'em if you got 'em

[Verse 3]
Making a movie on the couch with a flip phone
Just like you, like I like fingers in your mouth
Up on the sun, playing drums with a bleached bone
Just like you, like me, like everybody else

[Chorus]
When it gets loud, I turn it up
Oh, shake it like a bad girl up in Harlem
When it's too hot, I light it up
Oh, light it up, yeah, smoke 'em if you got 'em
When it's too soft, I shake it up
Oh, like I look at that girl up in Harlem
You're so sweet, but I like it rough
Oh, light it up yeah, smoke em if you got 'emYou might also like15Embed

songs.full_title: One of Us by New Politics
songs.title: One of Us

description.plain: “One Of Us” was the first single to be released by New Politics after being on the road for 3 years. According to a social media post by the band, “‘One Of Us’ represents friendship, love & unity.”

songs.embed_content: Read “One of Us” by New Politics on Genius

album.full_title: Lost In Translation by New Politics
album.name: Lost In Translation

annotatable.link_title: One of Us by New Politics
annotatable.title: One of Us

body.plain: “One Of Us” was the first single to be released by New Politics after being on the road for 3 years. According to a social media post by the band, “‘One Of Us’ represents friendship, love & unity.”

songs.lyrics:
13 ContributorsOne of Us Lyrics[Chorus 1]
Everybody needs a place to call their home
Everybody needs someone to call their own
Even when you're lonely, know you're not alone
You're one of us, one of us, one of us
One of us

[Verse 1]
(Oh)
Is this your starring role
Or just a cameo?
(Who are you living for, living for, living, oh)
When you can't take no more
'Cause when it rains, it pours
(What are you living for, living for, living)
I don't got much, but I got heart, and soul
I found myself through all the highs, and lows
(Oh)
Will you drown in the pain
Or go dance in the rain?
(What are you living for, living for, living)
[Chorus 2]
Everybody needs a place to call their home
Everybody's skin is different, not their bones
Even when you're lonely, know you're not alone
You're one of us, one of us, one of us
One of us
Bring the sunshine in
The happy days
The hardship, too
We'll find a way
So raise your flag
One last time
Before the day is through, I promise you
That we will laugh about it all
And we'll celebrate the things we've done for years to come
'Cause that's what friends, that's what friends are for

[Verse 2]
(Oh)
What have you done so far?
Are you satisfied?
(Who are you living for, living for, living, oh)
It takes a mighty fall
Before you learn to walk
(What are you living for, living for, living)
'Cause life's too short to take it as it goes
So stand up tall, and let the whole world know
(Oh)
So will you lose the game
Or go and claim your fame?
(What are you living for, living for, living)
You might also like[Chorus 2]
Everybody needs a place to call their home
Everybody needs someone to call their own
Even when you're lonely, know you're not alone
You're one of us, one of us, one of us
One of us
Bring the sunshine in
The happy days
The hardship, too
We'll find a way
So raise your flag
One last time
Before the day is through, I promise you
That we will laugh about it all
And we'll celebrate the things we've done for years to come
'Cause that's what friends, that's what friends are for

[Refrain]
(That's what friends, that's what friends are for)
(That's what friends, that's what friends are for)

[Bridge]
We will laugh about it all
And we'll celebrate the things we've done, the years to come
The good, the bad, the sweet, the sad
We will laugh about it all
And we'll celebrate, 'cause that's what friends
That's what friends are for
[Outro]
You're not alone
You're one of us, one of us, one of us
One of us3Embed

songs.lyrics:
9 ContributorsColor Green Lyrics[Verse 1]
A three-letter word
You didn't need a reason
You played your cards
He took what he needed
And now you're running wild with the horses
On open fields, you're feeling free
Rose petals on an empty bed
You're holding on to a teenage dream
Dancing in a wedding dress but it is only in your mind
[Chorus]
Color green, color green
The grass is red from all the cherry trees
Velveteen, velveteen
So sweet and soft, she’s falling with the leaves
Color green, color green
The grass is red from all the cherry trees
Velveteen, velveteen
So sweet and soft, she’s falling with the leaves

[Verse 2]
The painful truth
You'll have to let him go
Tears don’t last long, no
I'm here to let you know
I still love you with all of my feelings
So much I can’t count the ways now
I'd die for you a million times
And I hope that echoes through the end of time
I hope that echoes through the end of time, time

[Chorus]
Color green, color green
The grass is red from all the cherry trees
Velveteen, velveteen
So sweet and soft, she’s falling with the leaves
Color green, color green
The grass is red from all the cherry trees
Velveteen, velveteen
So sweet and soft, she’s falling with the leaves
You might also like[Verse 3]
The idea scares me, knowing one day you'll grow up
Will I embrace the change like seasons come and go?
I want to be there when you take your first steps and
Watch you climb to the top of a mountain
Treasure life in a million ways
Let your dreams and your heart light the way
Can your dreams and your heart light the way?

[Chorus]
Color green, color green
The grass is red from all the cherry trees
Velveteen, velveteen
So sweet and soft, she’s falling with the leaves
Color green, color green
The grass is red from all the cherry trees
Velveteen, velveteen
So sweet and soft, she’s falling with the leaves

[Outro]
(She's falling with the leaves
She's falling with the leaves)Embed
